fields.name: excerpt
fields.label: Excerpt
fields.description: Brief summary for previews and SEO (max 160 characters)

fields.name: updatedDate
fields.label: Last Updated
fields.description: Optional: When the post was last significantly updated

fields.name: imageAlt
fields.label: Image Alt Text
fields.description: Describe the image for accessibility and SEO

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: Select the main category for this post

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured Post
fields.description: Show this post in featured section on homepage

fields.name: trending
fields.label: Trending Post
fields.description: Mark as trending (shows in trending section)

fields.name: readTime
fields.label: Reading Time
fields.description: e.g., '5 min read' (auto-calculated if left empty)

fields.name: audioUrl
fields.label: Audio File URL
fields.description: Link to MP3 or audio file (optional)

fields.name: title
fields.label: SEO Title
fields.description: Custom title for search engines (max 60 chars)

fields.name: description
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: Custom description for search engines (max 160 chars)

fields.name: canonical
fields.label: Canonical URL
fields.description: If this content was published elsewhere first

fields.name: noindex
fields.label: No Index
fields.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this post

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Brief description of what this category covers

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured Category
fields.description: Show this category prominently on the homepage

fields.name: body
fields.label: Category Content
fields.description: Detailed description and content for the category page

fields.name: body
fields.label: Extended Bio
fields.description: Detailed author information for author page

fields.name: noindex
fields.label: No Index
fields.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this page

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
